@P_Hendrickson But also you don't say doctress or authoress, do you? I feel like awards shows are the ones keeping actress alive.

@P_Hendrickson I guess they invented the word because women weren't allowed to be actors for centuries?
@P_Hendrickson This is definitely something my female actor friends have noticed is more prevalent in the US. Here they are actors.
@P_Hendrickson No, it isn't redundant because actor is not gender-specific ðŸ˜Š
@P_Hendrickson You could just use actor. But if you must specify gender, female actor is the same as female doctor.

@robwillb I'm watching ep 8 now.
@robwillb Where did you stop?
@robwillb I was wondering if you'd managed to finish it yet. I'll probably get through it tonight.

Impressed with how focused this show has become this season; very little feels redundant unlike previous years. #BatesMotel
Nearing the end of season 4 of #BatesMotel and... the oddball tone is slowly giving way to tragedy and the pain of inevitability.
@likeadeuce That's where they moved to after being born in Kyrgyzstan, which is not long before they went to the US.
They were born in Kyrgyzstan, which is not Russia. Kyrgyzstan is also not on the list. https://t.co/LL7cz1vemN
How do you sleep at night? And I don't mean upside-down in your cave. https://t.co/sw0toUoh8D
@Equiatic_Bind Yeah, it boggles my mind that sort of ignorance
Australia and the United States have a lot in common, including their woeful, abhorrent treatment of refugees. https://t.co/W06pgETtEx
@Tara_Calaby And she has her beautiful wife back :)
@robwillb This is a nightmare
@EmilyJackCO Yes, it crossed my mind after the alt-gov't feeds popped up. But now it feels like a state of emergency.
@robwillb A friend of mine who lives in NY on a green card traveled back here for Xmas. She'll get back in because she's white.
@robwillb There are people with green cards who traveled and aren't being allowed back in. That's insane.
@squideye It's not but we've seen armed police forces mobilised against US citizens and protestors before, even recently.
@Jazifer Yes, that's a great point. Our leaders need to be better, but I'm not sure they are. Ours don't like refugees either :(
@xfkirsten Yes, I can already see how difficult this must be from the other side of the world. Living there it must be terrifying
@xfkirsten Yeah, the GOP narrative that the East & West coasts are out of touch belies the fact the interior is so insular
@xfkirsten It's not. And it's great to see Americans resisting. But it fills be with despair that this is happening over there.
And because most of my Twitter feed is Americans, I feel like I'm at the centre of it - and I should be, because I'm scared for them.
I'm seeing lawyers in New York gather on Facebook to triage arrivals at airports. And the alt-gov't Twitter accounts trying to get truth out
Right now it feels like American citizens are using Twitter & Facebook the same way it was used in Egypt during the Arab Spring of 2011.
@Tara_Calaby Welcome home, Tara! @fifail Glad you've arrived safely in the US, Fi :)
@PJSActor The best ðŸ˜­

John Hurt played Winston Smith in the film version of 1984, so of course he couldn't have lived through what's happening today
Crediting John Hurt as "Harry Potter actor" in the headline of his obit is so ridiculous. Also, every Brit actor ever will also suffer this.
@jadegrrrl The internet is wrong. Good lord.
@deedot255 Holy fuck. And why has she decided to admit this now?
@P_Hendrickson They're delicious.

@deedot255 Oh sure. They'll be fine.
@deedot255 Well, sure. I think all the credits are at the end of La La Land but Pasek and Paul are in the fine print. Seems wrong
@deedot255 Admittedly, in theatre the opposite happens. The lyricist is best known and the script/book writer is less known.
@deedot255 ... Pasek and Paul are left to get credits when the songs are listed, which are right near the end.
@deedot255 Classic MGM musicals credited the screen writers and the music/lyric writers up front...
#LaLaLand is credited as "Written By Damien Chazelle" which, as a musical, should require equal billing for lyricists Pasek and Paul
@Anotherfilmnerd They should make a movie together
@Anotherfilmnerd But also every Richard Curtis movie ever
@robwillb Thank you for the perfect setup :)

@robwillb I was about to Google fringing. It sounds sexual.
@robwillb ...but apparently now, some people use it to encompass more than that!
@robwillb Well, also mansplaining doesn't really mean making corrections. It's a specific patronising "know it all" kind of thing...
@robwillb Also, in this day and age of "alternative facts" I feel like making corrections is important. Esp. when mistakes are retweeted
